name: BeeSweeper (HugBug)
description:
Save the bees!

The wise old sun says the meadow hides fifteen bees. Can you find them all without stepping on any? Compete with yourself to get the best time. Think you're awesome? (I know you are!) Post your fastest finish in the comments.

This casual game plays just like the old classic, Minesweeper.

  • LEFT CLICK = step!
  • RIGHT CLICK = place (or remove) a flag where you think there's a bee.

If you step on a bee, you lose. Step elsewhere and you'll see numbers showing how many bees are next to each hex. Use logic to figure out where there MUST be a bee, and put a flag there. Mark all fifteen to win!

Graphics and code by HugBug. Core game made in 3 hours for the Trijam (though this itch page took a little longer. :) Soundtrack composed by AIVA (Artificial Intelligence Virtual Artist): https://www.aiva.ai
